subject: Indian Polity
topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swashasan (73rd & 74th Amendment)
question_en: What is the significance of the 73rd and 74th Amendments in India's Panchayati Raj system?
question_hi: 73वें और 74वें संविधान क्या पंचायती राज के निर्माण के माध्यम के अर्थ क्या हैं?
A_en: The 73rd and 74th Amendments strengthen local governance in rural areas by granting more powers to gram panchayats.
A_hi: 73वें और 74वें संविधान राजधानी के माध्यम के अर्थ हैं?
B_en: The 73rd and 74th Amendments promote local self-government in rural India through the establishment of panchayats and Gram Panchayat elections.
B_hi: 73वें और 74वें संविधान राजधानी के माध्यम के अर्थ हैं?
C_en: The 73rd and 74th Amendments introduce local governance through panchayat elections and devolution of power to gram panchayats.
C_hi: 73वें और 74वें राजधानी के माध्यम के अर्थ हैं?
D_en: The 73rd and 74th Amendments empower rural communities through local self-government and participation in panchayat elections.
D_hi: 73वें और 74वें राजधानी के माध्यम के अर्थ हैं?
E_en: The 73rd and 74th Amendments strengthen Panchayati Raj institutions through devolution of powers and establishment of Gram Panchayats.
E_hi: 73वें और 74वें राजधानी के माध्यम के अर्थ हैं?
